publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-784.3 Sarah Boyack: A National Food Policy for Scotland—As an amendment to motion (S3M-784) in the name of Richard Lochhead, leave out from "that takes into account" to end and insert ", building on work done by the previous administrations, and believes that policy priorities should include local procurement, affordability, sustainability and reducing Scotland’s climate footprint, taking into account the views of the Parliament, industry and wider society." Supported by: Margaret Curran*
